name: Parking Champion: Bike Rider
description:
Parking Champion: Bike Rider is always fun in free bike games 2018 and new bike games 3d. It is really a great fun to ride a heavy bike on city highway tracks while performing crazy stunts.
Features:

• Tricky and extremely tough tracks to ride.
• Different parking lots in multiple city locations.
• Most realistic bike parking simulator.
• Avoid crashes with moving road-barriers to park perfectly.
• Multiple exciting and challenging bike parking missions.
• Time deadline to complete each challenge.
